## Source: kam193 (dde05c4a0256dc32b25188e40f8bd2b4d3e3348cea23c0160994d46728c4c6bb)
Package hides an executable inside, and starts it when imported. The sandbox analysis shows only starting a calculator, which suggests it's a research attempt without a big harm.
